item.title: Overhanging plants over pavement, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aldersmead Road, New Beckenham, London

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 22nd July
item.description:
Car has been parked on public road for 2+ years without moving. MOT expired Jan 2025, now has SORN but is still on public road. Reported to 101 police and received notification to report to Council. Car has flat tyres, filthy, cobwebs, full of rubbish. Parked at the bottom of the road just before cul de sac, facing down, right hand side. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sparrow Drive, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
